doctext: dani ##lo bari ##llas , former guatemala ##n ambassador to spain and leader of the ruling christian democratic party ( pd ##c ) , was killed today by unidentified individuals in this capital , the police reported . according to official reports , bari ##llas was heading downtown from his home in southern guatemala city when he was intercepted by a group of unidentified individuals , who shot him down with machine ##gun fire . the police said that so far the identities of the attackers are unknown . this is the first pd ##c leader killed since president vin ##icio ce ##re ##zo assumed power in january 1986 .
